pages.text: Herb Pouches are a fast and compact way for players to store all kinds of Herbs (Pounded and Non-Pounded).
Scratched Herb Pouches can only hold up to a stack of herbs, making it the lowest tier that you can craft.
Stitched Herb Pouches can hold up to 3 stacks of herbs, with it being the second tier that you can craft.
Proper Herb Pouches can hold up to 4 stacks of herbs, which makes it the highest tier that you can currently craft.
These entries may also be useful in your studies.
